H0.text: Name Google's service launched in 2009 from which support was withdrawn in 2010, which offered 'next-generation email', messaging and twitter-style micro-blogging. Buzz

H1.text: Name Google's service launched in 2009 from which support was withdrawn in 2010, which offered 'next-generation email', messaging and twitter-style micro-blogging. Orkut

H2.text: Name Google's service launched in 2009 from which support was withdrawn in 2010, which offered 'next-generation email', messaging and twitter-style micro-blogging. Latitude

H3.text: Name Google's service launched in 2009 from which support was withdrawn in 2010, which offered 'next-generation email', messaging and twitter-style micro-blogging. Wave

A4.text: Google Wave was announced on May 28, 2009.

A5.text: On August 4, 2010, Google announced the suspension of stand-alone Wave development.
